phrs.translation: 蠢人, 笨蛋, 脊状头, 拳头发动机

sentences.sentence: You knucklehead! Can't you do anything right?
sentences.translation: 你这傻瓜！你不能做对一件事吗？

sentences.sentence: Knucklehead walks into a bank with a telephone!
sentences.translation: 傻瓜拿着一部电话走进银行！

sentences.sentence: The reality was that I was a 26-year old knucklehead, and since all my friends were getting married, I kind of felt it was time for me to do the same thing.
sentences.translation: 事实是，当时我是个26岁的傻瓜，我所有的朋友都结婚了，所以我觉得好像我也该作同样的事情。
